scripts.build: BABEL_ENV=production npm run scripts && npm run styles
scripts.release:patch: yarn build && npx standard-version -t '' -r patch && git push --follow-tags origin master
scripts.release:minor: yarn build && npx standard-version -t '' -r minor && git push --follow-tags origin master
scripts.release:major: yarn build && npx standard-version -t '' -r major && git push --follow-tags origin master
